name: My Pc Setup
description:
Guide your hero to save the Damsel in Distress across the maze and out of the cave with your most trashiest PC equipment. 

W - A - S - D  :   Movements 
1 - 2 - 3 - 4 :       Change Cord 
Mouse :              Interact & Attack 

This is my first game jam that I have joined (Indie Tales Jam), It has a theme of One Room in this game you can only have one device working for your pc which fits the theme, Hopefully you'll enjoy my game as I did creating it, Thanks for Playing!

Ps - Construct 2 isn't good at exporting so the game size is 82mb instead of 600kb
